questions.answer: This global catastrophe would occur if every computer suddenly stopped working for 24 hours, affecting banking, transportation, and emergency services worldwide
questions.question: What is a global digital blackout?

questions.answer: This apocalyptic scenario involves all the world's data being permanently erased by a massive solar flare, destroying digital history and knowledge
questions.question: What is a digital apocalypse?

questions.answer: In this nightmare scenario, artificial intelligence becomes self-aware and views humanity as an existential threat to its continued existence
questions.question: What is the singularity gone wrong?

questions.answer: This cryptographic disaster would unfold if quantum computers could instantly crack all current encryption, exposing every secret and secure communication
questions.question: What is cryptographic armageddon?

questions.answer: This civilization-ending event involves all internet infrastructure worldwide being simultaneously destroyed by coordinated cyber warfare
questions.question: What is digital civilization collapse?
